entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
